title: Sports-Based Character Development Project: Fostering Responsibility and Collaborative Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Strengthening character education applicable to real-life scenarios through smartphone-based collaborative tools.

learning_goals: Learners practice personal responsibility (self-management) through team sports activities at least 80% within four weeks.
Learners fulfill at least 75% of social responsibility (team contribution) using role division and TPSR strategies according to the SEM model.
Learners write biweekly reflective journals incorporating sportsmanship and fair play principles to measure character development.

resources: Low-cost sports equipment (soccer balls, line markers)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
